import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-devices', templateUrl: './devices.component.html', styleUrls: ['./devices.component.scss'] }) export class DevicesComponent { devices = [ { name: 'Living Room Lights', type: 'light', room: 'Living Room', status: 'On' }, { name: 'Kitchen AC', type: 'thermostat', room: 'Kitchen', status: 'Off' }, { name: 'Smart TV', type: 'entertainment', room: 'Living Room', status: 'On' } ]; }
